TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_lala', title = lala', year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/lala'} }

S.FORM: lala' (kamu nu Hulam: ) siiyu atu sibaykin ku lala'. u lala' ku kabalakian nu kilang, lutuk atu adidi'ay a cilekay atu . u lala' ku cacay a kakitizaan nu luma' ay mahmin, u lala' ku cacay a kakitizaan nu binawlan mahmin mazateng. lala' ahebal ku lala' nu kakitaan. . u kapahay a lala' kuyni. . silala'ay amana kita ka inal tu silala'ay a tademaw. . u silala'ay ciniza a tademaw. .
